titleStmt.title: A discourse made by the Ld Bishop of Rochester to the clergy of his diocese at his visitation in the year 1695 : published at their request.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Rochester. Bishop (1684-1713 : Sprat)
Sprat, Thomas, 1635-1713.

notesStmt.note: Half-title page reads: The Ld Bishop of Rochester's discourse to his clergy, &c.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
